rows.label: kizunatalk078_msg0001
rows.name: It truly is a breathtaking sight...

rows.label: kizunatalk078_msg0002
rows.name:
I never dreamed I would one day
be looking down at all of Alst...

rows.label: kizunatalk078_msg0003
rows.name:
But the height is so extreme
that it sends shivers down my spine...

rows.label: kizunatalk078_msg0004
rows.name:
Master, what thoughts come to
your mind as you stand here?

rows.label: kizunatalk078_msg0005
rows.name: What's on your mind as you stand here?

rows.label: kizunatalk078_msg0006
rows.name:
What would happen if
the World Tree collapsed?

rows.label: kizunatalk078_msg0007
rows.name:
How was this place constructed,
I wonder?

rows.label: kizunatalk078_msg0008
rows.name: What's on your mind as you stand here?

rows.label: kizunatalk078_msg0009
rows.name:
What if the World Tree
were to collapse?

rows.label: kizunatalk078_msg0010
rows.name: I wonder how they built this place?

rows.label: kizunatalk078_msg0011
rows.name: What comes to mind as you stand here?

rows.label: kizunatalk078_msg0012
rows.name:
Is there any risk of the
World Tree collapsing, I wonder?

rows.label: kizunatalk078_msg0013
rows.name:
I wonder by what means
this structure was built?

rows.label: kizunatalk078_msg0014
rows.name:
What thoughts come to
you as you stand here?

rows.label: kizunatalk078_msg0015
rows.name:
It would be disastrous if
this World Tree collapsed, wouldn't it?

rows.label: kizunatalk078_msg0016
rows.name: How was this place built, I wonder?

rows.label: kizunatalk078_msg0101
rows.name: This place is really high up...

rows.label: kizunatalk078_msg0102
rows.name:
It makes me wonder what would happen
if the World Tree were to fall.

rows.label: kizunatalk078_msg0103
rows.name: This place is at a serious altitude...

rows.label: kizunatalk078_msg0104
rows.name:
It's worrying to think about
what would happen if the World Tree
collapsed.

rows.label: kizunatalk078_msg0105
rows.name: We are at an unbelievable altitude here.

rows.label: kizunatalk078_msg0106
rows.name:
So I end up thinking about
what would happen if the World Tree
collapsed.

rows.label: kizunatalk078_msg0107
rows.name:
This place is at an
unbelievable height, ain't it?

rows.label: kizunatalk078_msg0108
rows.name:
So that's why I get worried 'bout
what would happen if the World Tree
toppled over.

rows.label: kizunatalk078_msg0109
rows.name: Yes, that is concerning!

rows.label: kizunatalk078_msg0110
rows.name:
I'm beginning to worry about
the safety of such a tall,
slender structure...

rows.label: kizunatalk078_msg0111
rows.name:
If the World Tree were to collapse,
we wouldn't make it out alive,
would we?

rows.label: kizunatalk078_msg0112
rows.name:
As long as we stay here,
I determine that the possibility of
colliding with Alst is extremely low.

rows.label: kizunatalk078_msg0113
rows.name:
At even lower levels of the World Tree...
where you fought Marveni and Shin,
it would probably collapse.

rows.label: kizunatalk078_msg0114
rows.name:
However, this is the vacuum of space...
and furthermore,
we're in orbit around Alst.

rows.label: kizunatalk078_msg0115
rows.name:
Even if the World Tree were to collapse
completely, I predict that this location
would remain in orbit in space.

rows.label: kizunatalk078_msg0116
rows.name: That's...hard to imagine.

rows.label: kizunatalk078_msg0117
rows.name:
Hmm...
I don't quite get it...

rows.label: kizunatalk078_msg0118
rows.name: It's hard to believe right away...

rows.label: kizunatalk078_msg0119
rows.name:
Hard to believe,
but I s'pose it's true...

rows.label: kizunatalk078_msg0120
rows.name:
But I'm somewhat relieved to know
this place would survive
even if the Tree collapsed.

rows.label: kizunatalk078_msg0121
rows.name:
But wait, wouldn't that mean
we'd lose our way back to Alst?

rows.label: kizunatalk078_msg0122
rows.name:
M-m-meh!? KOS-MOS Re:,
what will happen to Tora and everyone?

rows.label: kizunatalk078_msg0123
rows.name:
Either we'll continue to orbit Alst,
or we'll deviate from orbit and wander
through space, it will be one of those.

rows.label: kizunatalk078_msg0124
rows.name:
So either way, this would become
our final resting place...correct?

rows.label: kizunatalk078_msg0125
rows.name: Precisely.

rows.label: kizunatalk078_msg0126
rows.name:
Tora is starting to
want to go home now...

rows.label: kizunatalk078_msg0127
rows.name: Please be reassured.

rows.label: kizunatalk078_msg0128
rows.name:
I will do everything possible to prevent
such a scenario. Protecting
Drivers is my purpose, after all.

rows.label: kizunatalk078_msg0129
rows.name:
But Tora isn't technically a Driver, you
know. Just a young Nopon.

rows.label: kizunatalk078_msg0131
rows.name:
I will protect you after I have ensured
the safety of Rex, Nia, Meleph, and Zeke.

rows.label: kizunatalk078_msg0132
rows.name: Meh-meh-meh?! Fifth in line?!

rows.label: kizunatalk078_msg0133
rows.name:
...If you wish to be a priority,
I suggest you rely on Hana
for protection.

rows.label: kizunatalk078_msg0134
rows.name: KOS-MOS Re: too cruel!

rows.label: kizunatalk078_msg0135
rows.name:
Hahaha!
KOS-MOS Re: can be quite amusing!

rows.label: kizunatalk078_msg0136
rows.name:
Hahahah! You're a regular
riot, KOS-MOS Re:.

rows.label: kizunatalk078_msg0137
rows.name:
Ahaha... You can be quite
amusing at times, KOS-MOS Re:.

rows.label: kizunatalk078_msg0138
rows.name:
Hahahah! You're a funny gal,
you know that, KOS-MOS Re:?

rows.label: kizunatalk078_msg0139
rows.name:
Do you think so?
I'm actually being quite serious...

rows.label: kizunatalk078_msg0140
rows.name:
No no,
that's exactly what makes it good.

rows.label: kizunatalk078_msg0141
rows.name:
No, I get that... But that
just makes it even better!

rows.label: kizunatalk078_msg0142
rows.name:
Oh, I appreciate that. But that's
part of what makes it so funny.

rows.label: kizunatalk078_msg0143
rows.name:
Yeah, but that just makes it
even funnier, y'know?

rows.label: kizunatalk078_msg0201
rows.name:
The first step is to launch a satellite
from Alst into orbit.

rows.label: kizunatalk078_msg0202
rows.name: I see, I see...

rows.label: kizunatalk078_msg0203
rows.name:
This geostationary satellite
then deploys a cable down toward Alst.

rows.label: kizunatalk078_msg0204
rows.name:
And on the opposite side, a
counterweight is attached as the
cable extends outward.

rows.label: kizunatalk078_msg0205
rows.name: I see...

rows.label: kizunatalk078_msg0206
rows.name:
By repeating this process, the cable
will eventually reach Alst's surface.

rows.label: kizunatalk078_msg0207
rows.name:
Then elevators are attached to this cable
to transport materials.

rows.label: kizunatalk078_msg0208
rows.name: Yes, yes...?

rows.label: kizunatalk078_msg0209
rows.name:
Then, gradually increasing in scale,
the World Tree is constructed.

rows.label: kizunatalk078_msg0210
rows.name:
I can kind of imagine it,
but it's still gibberish to me.

rows.label: kizunatalk078_msg0211
rows.name:
Indeed, it's completely
beyond my comprehension.

rows.label: kizunatalk078_msg0212
rows.name:
How do you know all this stuff,
KOS-MOS Re:?

rows.label: kizunatalk078_msg0213
rows.name:
Where are you getting all this
from, KOS-MOS Re:?

rows.label: kizunatalk078_msg0214
rows.name:
How do you know all these
complex things, KOS-MOS Re:?

rows.label: kizunatalk078_msg0215
rows.name:
Listen, KOS-MOS Re:... How d'you
even know about this stuff?

rows.label: kizunatalk078_msg0216
rows.name:
That is something
I don't know myself.

rows.label: kizunatalk078_msg0217
rows.name: You don't know either?

rows.label: kizunatalk078_msg0218
rows.name: Correct.

rows.label: kizunatalk078_msg0219
rows.name:
This information exists
independently from my memory files...

rows.label: kizunatalk078_msg0220
rows.name:
It appears that this data persists
even when I return to Core Crystal form.

rows.label: kizunatalk078_msg0221
rows.name:
Just as we Blades remember our names
when we are born, this knowledge
is inherent from the beginning.

rows.label: kizunatalk078_msg0222
rows.name:
So I have no idea
who implanted this data,
or for what purpose they did so.

rows.label: kizunatalk078_msg0223
rows.name:
So even KOS-MOS Re:
has things she doesn't know.

rows.label: kizunatalk078_msg0224
rows.name:
So there's stuff even you don't
know, huh.

rows.label: kizunatalk078_msg0225
rows.name:
So there are some things even
you don't know.

rows.label: kizunatalk078_msg0226
rows.name:
I guess there's some stuff even
you don't know.

rows.label: kizunatalk078_msg0227
rows.name: Yes, indeed...

rows.label: kizunatalk078_msg0228
rows.name:
Perhaps that's why
I exist alongside a Driver -
to discover these answers.
